game.name: Giantfall
game.shortDescription: Defend against colossal threats in a minimalist medieval world where every building counts. Build defences, towers, military and economic buildings, research and raise armies to defend the realm. Lead your people, build and defend the kingdom against an invasion of Giants and Giant creatures.
